hadith.text: Narrated Abu Hurairah: That the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) said: "There are three for whom it is a right upon Allah to help him: The Mujahid in the cause of Allah, the Mukatab who intends to fulfill (the Kitabah), and the one getting married who intends chastity." [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Hasan
